metadata.title: CVE-2017-10685 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - negligible.
metadata.description: In ncurses 6.0, there is a format string vulnerability in the fmt_entry function. A crafted input will lead to a remote arbitrary code execution attack.

notes.note: mdeslaur> Red Hat considers this issue as a duplicate of CVE-2017-10684.

criterions.comment: ncurses package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.1-1ubuntu1').
